title: "Mid or Feed"
body:
Can't believe this shit still goes on in champ select. But it does. People will sometimes get filled, show up in team select, and declare, "Mid or feed".

And the funny thing is...60% of the time or more, players are willing to trade roles if simply asked!

So, come on, GTFO with this shit already!

replies.body: Mid or Feed i guess they never feed huh ? you've got a mid laner i bet he doesn't kiss ya

> [{quoted}](name=crispy66,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6GNuqJxa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-03T08:52:15.314+0000)
>
> Mid or Feed i guess they never feed huh ? you've got a mid laner i bet he doesn't kiss ya

Sadly most of them are actually "feed or feed"
Most of the time they’ll feed anyway because they’re tilted.

Try draft. No arguments, players are far better in general.

The only reason to play blinds is to get matched with garbage-tier players so you can pubstomp.  See my match history for details.

100% of my blind matches were either lost or won at the loading screen.

Every single one of you knows what i am talking about.

2x people with smite
1-3 afk
Wrong champ for the lane
General toxicity in the lobby
Just bunch of other examples

This game sucks ,just open your mind and look out there ,so many titles.

Blind pick is trash, dont play it if you want any agency in the game outcome.

Not the game, just the queue where people too dysfunctional/bad/troll for draft or ranked land.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6GNuqJxa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-03T05:54:24.356+0000)
>
> Try draft. No arguments, players are far better in general.
> 
> The only reason to play blinds is to get matched with garbage-tier players so you can pubstomp.  See my match history for details.

Wasn't referring to blinds.
I cant say i have ever seen a single lane ultimatum in draft, what queue and rough rank?
That's why we should be allowed to dodge 2 times every 24 hours before getting any penalties.

cuz they are 12 year old kid who keep talking trash like that whenever i meet people say " mid or feed " or something like that i always dodge the game, idon;t really want waste of my time with those kids

> [{quoted}](name=Chocolate Frost,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6GNuqJxa,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-03T05:39:11.247+0000)
>
> Can&#039;t believe this shit still goes on in champ select. But it does. People will sometimes get filled, show up in team select, and declare, &quot;Mid or feed&quot;.
> 
> And the funny thing is...60% of the time or more, players are willing to trade roles if simply asked!
> 
> So, come on, GTFO with this shit already!

report him with screenshot of his spoken words + email to riot support if u want to.
Maybe he gets a punishment right away if he is a serial troll or another +1 on his "soon gonna be bannd" list

You believe in the report system?

Aaaaahahahahahahhahahahaahha

I was banned by a premade that said they were gonna ban me on chat becouse they are toxic.

Meanwhile every other game played either has trolls, afkers or inters, think about it, if report system was working, would there still be SO MUCH toxicity around. This game is the mother of all toxic communities, and i've played a lot.
I feel like even playing Draft doesn't help, if they get any role except for mid, they either claim "mid or feed", run it down mid, troll you when you are cs-ing, feed, or afk

Ma man.

Still playing league, like wow addicts still play wow.

Meanwhile bunch of other, better games out there, with league keeping all the toxicity trapped in it.
